        @RequestMapping(value="/createRule",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String createRule(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                             @CurrentUser
                                                                                                             RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                             java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                             java.lang.String type)
        Request call to create new Rules.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - Name of the current project.
        type - Type of Component
        Returns:
        editRule html document which shows the rule properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user has no right to do this or project doesn't exist.

      • editRule

        @RequestMapping(value="/editRule",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String editRule(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                         @CurrentUser
                                                                                                         RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                         java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rule,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                         java.lang.String type)
        Rest call to edit a Rule.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - Name of the current project.
        rule - RefID of the rule
        type - Type of the Component
        Returns:
        editrule if user, guesteditrule if guest html documents to show the rule properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if project or rule doesn't exist.

      • saveRule

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveRule",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String saveRule(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                         @CurrentUser
                                                                                                         RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rOldID,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rRefID,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rDesc,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rCypher,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rSeverity,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rType,
                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                         java.lang.String rTaglist)
        Rest call to save all new values of the current rule.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - Name of the project.
        rOldID - old ID of the current rule.
        rRefID - RefID of the current rule.
        rDesc - description of the current rule.
        rCypher - cypher of the current rule.
        rSeverity - severity of the current rule.
        rType - type of the current rule.
        rTaglist - taglist of the current rule.
        Returns:
        confirmation The html document that confirms the actions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user has no right to do this, the referenceID is too short or the project doesn't exist.

      • updateParameters

        @RequestMapping(value="/udpateParameters",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String updateParameters(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                         @CurrentUser
                                                                                                                         RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String rRefID,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String rType,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="",value="toUpdateId")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String[] toUpdateId,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="",value="toUpdateName")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String[] toUpdateName,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="",value="toUpdateValue")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String[] toUpdateValue,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="",value="isString")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String[] isString)
        Rest call to update the parameters of a Component.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - Name of the current project.
        rRefID - refID of the current component.
        rType - Type of the current component.
        toUpdateId - ID of the parameter.
        toUpdateName - name of the parameter.
        toUpdateValue - value of the parameter.
        isString - check if parameter is a string or an int.
        Returns:
        confirmation html document to confirm the actions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user has no right to do this or the project doesn't exist.

        sourceRefID - refID of the current Component.

        RefID - RefID of the reference which is to be deleted.
        Type - type of the reference which is to be deleted.
        Returns:

        editTemplate html document which shows the template properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user has no right to do this or the project doesn't exist.

      • editTemplate

        @RequestMapping(value="/editTemplate")
public java.lang.String editTemplate(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                             @CurrentUser
                                                                             RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String project,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String tRefID)
        Rest call to edit a template.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - Name of the current project.
        tRefID - refID of the template.
        Returns:
        editTemplate if user or guesteditTemplate if guest html document that shows template properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/template doesn't exist.

      • saveTemplate

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveTemplate")
public java.lang.String saveTemplate(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                             @CurrentUser
                                                                             RegistredUser regUser,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String project,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String tOldID,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String tRefID,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String tDescr,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String tCyph,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String tTaglist)
        Rest call to save the changes in a template.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - Name of the current project.
        tOldID - oldRefId of the template.
        tRefID - RefID of the template.
        tDescr - Description of the template.
        tCyph - Cypher of the Template.
        tTaglist - Taglist of the template.
        Returns:
        confirmation html document that confirms the saving.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/template doesn't exist.

      • confirmDeleteProject

        @RequestMapping(value="/confirmationDeleteTemplate",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String confirmDeleteProject(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                       @CurrentUser
                                                                                                                                       RegistredUser regUser,

                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String tRefID)
        Rest call to confirm the deletion of the template.
        Parameters:
        model -
        regUser - The user status.
        project - Name of the current project.
        tRefID - RefID of the current template.
        Returns:
        confirmationDeleteTemplate html document to confirm the deletion of the template.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/template doesn't exist.

      • deleteTemplate

        @RequestMapping(value="/deleteTemplate",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String deleteTemplate(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String tRefID,
                                                                                                                     @CurrentUser
                                                                                                                     RegistredUser regUser)
        Rest call to delete the Template.
        Parameters:
        project - Name of the current project.
        tRefID - RefID of the current template.
        regUser - The user status.
        Returns:
        redirection to the projects list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the project/template doesn't exist.
